summary.span: 會以一或多個唯讀、順向結果集的形式，取得一或多個 物件的內容。

span.span: The obtains the contents of one or more objects in the form of one or more read-only, forward-only result sets.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 運作方式十分類似任何其他資料讀取器這類，差異在於逐一查看中的資料列提供。The works much like any other data reader, such as the , except that the provides for iterating over rows in a . 換句話說，它會提供用於逐一查看快取中的資料列。In other words, it provides for iterating over rows in a cache. 您可以修改快取的資料而為作用中，而且讀取器會自動維護它的位置。The cached data can be modified while the is active, and the reader automatically maintains its position. 當您建立從，產生物件包含一個結果集具有相同的資料為從它建立，除了已標示為已刪除的任何資料列。When you create a from a , the resulting object contains one result set with the same data as the from which it was created, except for any rows that have been marked as deleted. 資料行出現在相同的順序，與原始。The columns appear in the same order as in the original . 傳回的結果的結構中有相同的結構描述和資料與原始。The structure of the returned result is identical in schema and data to the original . A呼叫中建立方法物件包含多個結果集，如果包含一個以上的資料表。A that was created by calling the method of a object contains multiple result sets if the contains more than one table. 結果會依照相同的順序中的物件的物件。The results are in the same sequence as the objects in the of the object. 傳回的結果集包含的目前版本的每個; 標示為刪除的資料列會略過。The returned result set contains only the current version of each ; rows that are marked for deletion are skipped. `DataTableReader`提供的穩定迭代器，也就是內容`DataTableReader`如果期間反覆項目經過修改基礎集合的大小不會失效。The `DataTableReader` provides a stable iterator; that is, the contents of the `DataTableReader` are not invalidated if the size of the underlying collection is modified during iteration. 例如，如果一個或多個中的資料列集合已被刪除或移除在反覆項目內的目前位置`DataTableReader`會適當地維護並不會使迭代器。For example, if one or more rows in the collection are deleted or removed during iteration, the current position within the `DataTableReader` is maintained appropriately and it does not invalidate the iterator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您必須建立根據所有或特定內的資料表子集，呼叫`DataSet`的方法。If you must create a based on all or a subset of the tables within a specific , call the `DataSet`'s method. 如果您想要建立新執行個體根據一組`DataTable`有不相關的執行個體使用這個建構函式。If you want to create a new instance based on a group of `DataTable` instances that are not otherwise related, use this constructor. 您也可以利用這個建構函式，若要重新排列的排序`DataTables`內`DataTableReader`，如果其來源內排序`DataSet`不符合您的需求。You can also take advantage of this constructor to rearrange the ordering of the `DataTables` within the `DataTableReader`, if their ordering within their source `DataSet` does not meet your needs. ## Examples 在下列範例中，TestConstructor 方法會建立兩個執行個體。In the following example, the TestConstructor method creates two instances. 為了示範這個建構函式類別，此範例會建立新`DataTableReader`根據陣列，其中包含兩個`DataTables`，並執行簡單的作業前, 幾個資料行的內容列印至主控台視窗。In order to demonstrate this constructor for the class, the sample creates a new `DataTableReader` based on an array that contains the two `DataTables`, and performs a simple operation, printing the contents from the first few columns to the console window. 若要測試此應用程式，請建立新的主控台應用程式，並將範例程式碼貼到新建立的檔案。In order to test this application, create a new Console application, and paste the sample code into the newly created file. summary.span: 從指定的資料行位移開始，將位元組的資料流讀入緩衝區，做為從指定的緩衝區位移開始的陣列。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `GetBytes` 在欄位中傳回可用位元組的數。`GetBytes` returns the number of available bytes in the field. 大多數情況下這是欄位的實際長度。Most of the time this is the exact length of the field. 不過，傳回的數字可能小於欄位的長度，則為 true 如果`GetBytes`已經使用來取得位元組的欄位。However, the number returned may be less than the true length of the field if `GetBytes` has already been used to obtain bytes from the field. 這可能是，比方說，當讀入緩衝區的大型資料結構This may be the case, for example, when the is reading a large data structure into a buffer 如果您傳遞的緩衝區`null`(`Nothing` Visual Basic 中)，`GetBytes`傳回整個欄位的長度，以位元組為單位，而非剩餘大小緩衝區的位移參數為基礎。If you pass a buffer that is `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), `GetBytes` returns the length of the entire field in bytes, not the remaining size based on the buffer offset parameter. 不會進行轉換;因此擷取的資料必須已經是位元組陣列或強制為位元組陣列。No conversions are performed; therefore the data retrieved must already be a byte array or coercible to a byte array. ## Examples 下列範例會建立根據 AdventureWorks 範例資料庫，並將每個映像擷取到 C:\ 資料夾中的個別檔案中的資料。The following example creates a based on data in the AdventureWorks sample database, and saves each image retrieved to a separate file in the C:\ folder. 若要測試此應用程式，請建立新的主控台應用程式、 參考 System.Drawing.dll 組件，並將範例程式碼貼到新建立的檔案。In order to test this application, create a new Console application, reference the System.Drawing.dll assembly, and paste the sample code into the newly created file. remarks.format: ## Remarks `GetChars` 在欄位中傳回可用字元的數。`GetChars` returns the number of available characters in the field. 大多數情況下這是欄位的實際長度。Most of the time this is the exact length of the field. 不過，傳回的數字可能小於欄位的長度，則為 true 如果`GetChars`已經使用從欄位取得字元。However, the number returned may be less than the true length of the field if `GetChars` has already been used to obtain characters from the field. 如果欄位結尾為止，實際讀取的字元數目可以小於所要求的長度。The actual number of characters read can be less than the requested length, if the end of the field is reached. 如果您傳遞緩衝區為 null (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)，`GetChars`傳回整個欄位的長度，以字元為單位，而非剩餘大小緩衝區的位移參數為基礎。If you pass a buffer that is null (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), `GetChars` returns the length of the entire field in characters, not the remaining size based on the buffer offset parameter. 不會進行轉換;因此要擷取的資料必須已經是字元陣列或強制為字元陣列。No conversions are performed; therefore the data to be retrieved must already be a character array or coercible to a character array. ## Examples 下列範例示範`GetChars`方法。The following example demonstrates the `GetChars` method. `TestGetChars`方法應傳遞`DataTableReader`填滿資料的兩個資料行： 第一個資料行，並在第二個字元的陣列中的檔案名稱。The `TestGetChars` method expects to be passed a `DataTableReader` filled with two columns of data: a file name in the first column, and an array of characters in the second. 颾魤 ㄛ`TestGetChars`可讓您指定的字元陣列中讀取資料時要使用的緩衝區大小`DataTableReader`。In addition, `TestGetChars` lets you specify the buffer size to be used as it reads the data from the character array in the `DataTableReader`. `TestGetChars` 建立對應至每個資料列中的資料檔案`DataTableReader`，使用所提供的資料中的第一個資料行`DataTableReader`做為檔案名稱。`TestGetChars` creates a file corresponding to each row of data in the `DataTableReader`, using the supplied data in the first column of the `DataTableReader` as the file name. 此程序示範如何使用`GetChars`方法讀取的資料會儲存在`DataTable`做為字元陣列。This procedure demonstrates the use of the `GetChars` method reading data that was stored in the `DataTable` as a character array. 任何其他類型的資料會導致`GetChars`方法會擲回`InvalidCastException`。Any other type of data causes the `GetChars` method to throw an `InvalidCastException`. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Collections.IEnumerator GetEnumerator() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetEnumerator () As IEnumerator

summary.span: 傳回可用來逐一查看項目集合的列舉值。

span.span: Returns an enumerator that can be used to iterate through the item collection.
An object that represents the item collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 列舉值只允許讀取的資料。Enumerators only allow for reading the data in the . 列舉值無法用來修改基礎集合中。Enumerators cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 一開始，列舉值位於集合中的第一個項目之前。At first, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 在這個位置上，呼叫會擲回例外狀況。At this position, calling throws an exception. 因此，在讀取 `MoveNext` 的值之前，必須呼叫 `Current` 以將列舉值前移至集合的第一個項目。Therefore, you must call `MoveNext` to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of `Current`. `Current` 會傳回，並傳回相同的物件，直到或呼叫。`Current` returns a , and returns the same object until either or is called. `MoveNext` 會將 `Current` 設定為下一個項目。`MoveNext` sets `Current` to the next element. 傳遞集合的結尾後，列舉值會放置在集合中的最後一個元素之後和呼叫`MoveNext`會傳回 false。After the end of the collection is passed, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection, and calling `MoveNext` returns false. 如果上次呼叫`MoveNext`傳回`false`，則呼叫`Current`會擲回例外狀況。If the last call to `MoveNext` returned `false`, calling `Current` throws an exception. 此外，因為提供順向存取其資料，呼叫IEnumerator 的方法會擲回。In addition, because the provides forward-only access to its data, calling the method of the IEnumerator throws a . 提供穩定的列舉值。The provides a stable enumerator. 這表示，即使基礎資料中發生的資料列刪除或新增項目，列舉值傳回呼叫仍然有效。This means that even if row deletions or additions occur within the underlying data, the enumerator returned by a call to is still valid. ## Examples 下列範例示範 方法的用法。The following example demonstrates the use of the method. 這包括列舉值的行為，從基礎刪除資料列時列舉值為使用中時。This includes the behavior of the enumerator when rows are deleted from the underlying while the enumerator is active. [!code-csharp[DataWorks DataTableReader.GetEnumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataTableReader.GetEnumerator/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks DataTableReader.GetEnumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataTableReader.GetEnumerator/VB/source.vb#1)] 程序會在主控台視窗中顯示下列文字：The procedure displays the following text in the Console window: ``` Peter Mary Russ ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為大部分的方法提供類別必須提供使用序數資料行編號，您可以使用`GetOrdinal`方法來擷取資料行數目，給定的資料行的名稱。Because most of the methods provided by the class must be provided with an ordinal column number, you can use the `GetOrdinal` method to retrieve the column number, given the name of the column. `GetOrdinal` 第一次執行區分大小寫的查閱。`GetOrdinal` performs a case-sensitive lookup first. 如果失敗，會使用第二個的不區分大小寫搜尋。If it fails, a second case-insensitive search is made. 如果找不到的資料行編號`IndexOutOfRangeException`就會擲回。If the column number is not found an `IndexOutOfRangeException` is thrown. `GetOrdinal` 假名寬度是不區分大小寫的。`GetOrdinal` is kana-width insensitive. 因為根據序數進行查閱比具名查閱更有效率，很效率不佳，呼叫`GetOrdinal`迴圈內。Because ordinal-based lookups are more efficient than named lookups, it is inefficient to call `GetOrdinal` within a loop. 節省時間，藉由呼叫`GetOrdinal`一次，並將結果指派給整數變數以便使用於迴圈Save time by calling `GetOrdinal` one time and assigning the results to an integer variable for use within the loop ## Examples 如果您有資料行名稱，在此情況下的資料行名稱是由使用者提供，以及您必須擷取資料行中的資訊，您可以使用如下所示的程序來擷取所需的資訊。If you have only a column name, in which case the column name is user supplied, and you must retrieve information from the column, you can use a procedure like the following to extract the required information. 在此範例中，程序接受資料行名稱，並傳回包含該資料行中目前資料列內之資料的:In this example, the procedure accepts a column name and returns the data that is contained within that column for the current row in the : [!code-csharp[DataWorks DataTableReader.GetOrdinal#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataTableReader.GetOrdinal/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks DataTableReader.GetOrdinal#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataTableReader.GetOrdinal/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks GetSchemaTable 方法會傳回有關每個資料行中繼資料，以下列順序：The GetSchemaTable method returns metadata about each column in the following order: |DataReader 資料行DataReader column|描述Description| |-----------------------|-----------------| |ColumnNameColumnName|資料行名稱會出現在。The name of the column as it appears in the .| |ColumnOrdinalColumnOrdinal|資料行的序數The ordinal of the column| |ColumnSizeColumnSize|-1，否則(或) 屬性無法判斷或不相關，反之則為 0 或正整數，包含`MaxLength`值。-1 if the (or ) property of the cannot be determined or is not relevant; otherwise, 0 or a positive integer that contains the `MaxLength` value.| |NumericPrecisionNumericPrecision|如果資料行類型是數值類型，這會是資料行的最大有效位數。If the column type is a numeric type, this is the maximum precision of the column. 如果資料行類型不是數值資料類型，這會是 null 值。If the column type is not a numeric data type, this is a null value.| |NumericScaleNumericScale|如果資料行資料類型的小數位數元件，返回小數點右邊的位數。If column data type has a scale component, return the number of digits to the right of the decimal point. 否則，傳回 null 值。Otherwise, return a null value.| |DataTypeDataType|資料行的基礎類型。The underlying type of the column.| |ProviderTypeProviderType|資料行的資料類型的指標。The indicator of the column's data type. 如果資料行的資料類型而異的逐列，這個值會是。If the data type of the column varies from row to row, this value is . 此資料行不能包含 null 值。This column cannot contain a null value.| |IsLongIsLong|`true` 如果資料行的資料類型是及其屬性為-1。`true` if the data type of the column is and its property is -1. 否則為 `false`。Otherwise, `false`.| |AllowDBNullAllowDBNull|`true` 如果 AllowDbNull 條件約束設定為 true 的資料行;否則， `false`。`true` if the AllowDbNull constraint is set to true for the column; otherwise, `false`.| |IsReadOnlyIsReadOnly|`true` 如果無法修改資料行;否則`false`。`true` if the column cannot be modified; otherwise `false`.| |IsRowVersionIsRowVersion|`false`每個資料行。`false`, for every column.| |IsUniqueIsUnique|`true`：在任何兩個資料列可以有相同的值，這個資料行中。`true`: No two rows in the can have the same value in this column. `IsUnique` 會保證如果資料行代表索引鍵，則為 true。 透過本身或是否有類型只適用於此資料行的 UNIQUE 條件約束。`IsUnique` is guaranteed to be true if the column represents a key by itself or if there is a constraint of type UNIQUE that applies only to this column. `false`：資料行可以包含重複的值，在`DataTable`。`false`: The column can contain duplicate values in the `DataTable`. 此資料行的預設值是`false`。The default of this column is `false`.| |IsKeyIsKey|`true`：資料行是一組資料行的其中一個，結合起來，可唯一識別中的資料列。`true`: The column is one of a set of columns that, taken together, uniquely identify the row in the . 使用的資料行集中`IsKey`設定為`true`必須唯一識別中的資料列`DataTable`。The set of columns with `IsKey` set to `true` must uniquely identify a row in the `DataTable`. 沒有這個資料行集是資料行的最少的需求。There is no requirement that this set of columns is a minimal set of columns. 這組資料行可能會產生從`DataTable`主索引鍵、 唯一條件約束或唯一索引。This set of columns may be generated from a `DataTable` primary key, a unique constraint or a unique index. `false`：資料行不是需要唯一識別資料列。`false`: The column is not required to uniquely identify the row. 這個值是`true`如果資料行建立單一或複合主索引鍵。This value is `true` if the column participates in a single or composite primary key. 否則，其值是`false`。Otherwise, its value is `false`.| |IsAutoIncrementIsAutoIncrement|`true`：資料行至新的資料列，以固定遞增方式指派值。`true`: The column assigns values to new rows in fixed increments. `false`：資料行不會以新的資料列，以固定遞增方式指派值。`false`: The column does not assign values to new rows in fixed increments. 此資料行的預設值是`false`。The default of this column is `false`.| |BaseCatalogNameBaseCatalogName|包含資料行的資料存放區中的類別目錄名稱。The name of the catalog in the data store that contains the column. `Null` 如果無法判斷基底目錄名稱。`Null` if the base catalog name cannot be determined. 此資料行的預設值是`null`值。The default value for this column is a `null` value.| |BaseSchemaNameBaseSchemaName|這個值一律是`Null`。This value is always `Null`.| |BaseTableNameBaseTableName| 的名稱。The name of the .| |BaseColumnNameBaseColumnName|中的資料行名稱。The name of the column in the .| |AutoIncrementSeedAutoIncrementSeed|值的屬性。The value of the 's property.| |AutoIncrementStepAutoIncrementStep|值的屬性。The value of the 's property.| |DefaultValueDefaultValue|值的屬性。The value of the 's property.| |運算式Expression|如果目前的資料行的運算式資料行，但運算式中使用的所有資料行屬於相同的運算式字串`T:System.Data.DataTable`，其中包含的運算式資料行，否則為`null`。The expression string, if the current column is an expression column and all columns used in the expression belong to the same `T:System.Data.DataTable` that contains the expression column; otherwise `null`.| |ColumnMappingColumnMapping|相關聯的值。The value associated with the . 類型可以是其中一個`Attribute`， `Element`， `Hidden`，或`SimpleContent`。The type can be one of `Attribute`, `Element`, `Hidden`, or `SimpleContent`. 預設值為 `Element`。The default value is `Element`.| |BaseTableNamespaceBaseTableNamespace|值的屬性。The value of the 's property.| |BaseColumnNamespaceBaseColumnNamespace|值的屬性。The value of the 's property.| ## Examples 下列主控台應用程式範例會擷取指定的資料行的結構描述資訊。The following console application example retrieves schema information about the specified column. 傳遞`DisplaySchemaTableInfo`程序和整數，表示中的資料行的序數位置`DataTableReader`，並在程序輸出至主控台視窗的結構描述資訊。Pass the `DisplaySchemaTableInfo` procedure a and an integer representing the ordinal position of a column within the `DataTableReader`, and the procedure outputs schema information to the console window. remarks.format: ## Remarks 對於大部分的應用程式，這個方法會提供有效率的方法，用於擷取所有的資料行，而不是個別擷取每個資料行。For most applications, this method provides an efficient means for retrieving all columns, instead of retrieving each column individually. 如果您的目的是擷取中的資料列中的所有資料行值，則`GetValues`方法提供最有效率的解決方案。If your intent is to retrieve all the column values from a row within the , the `GetValues` method provides the most efficient solution. 您可以傳遞陣列包含少於一個產生的資料列中包含的資料行數目。You can pass an array that contains fewer than the number of columns that are contained in the resulting row. 資料量`Object`陣列可以保存複製到陣列。Only the amount of data the `Object` array can hold is copied to the array. 您也可以傳遞`Object`其長度大於包含在產生的資料列，並在其中案例的其他陣列項目會維持不變方法呼叫中的資料行數目的陣列。You can also pass an `Object` array whose length is more than the number of columns that are contained in the resulting row, in which case the additional array elements remains unchanged by the method call. 這個方法會放置`DBNull`null 資料行的輸出陣列中。This method places `DBNull` in the output array for null columns. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用正確的大小，以讀取目前的資料列中所提供的所有值的陣列。The following example demonstrates using an array that is the correct size, to read all values from the current row in the supplied . 此外，此範例會示範使用固定大小的陣列，可能較小或大於可用的資料行數目。In addition, the sample demonstrates using a fixed-sized array that could be either smaller or larger than the number of available columns.
